Title: Fair Skies and Strong Winds
Description:
It has been a long road for us all, $n.

But after persevering through hardship and strife, dragonkind stands poised to enter a new age.

Before you leave for your next adventure, my fellow Aspects and I wish to thank you for all you have done for us.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Alexstrasza at the Seat of the Aspects in Valdrakken.

Objectives.Text: Speak with Alexstrasza at the Seat of the Aspects
